From Aston End, to Codicote and Knebworth together we can secure a brighter future for Stevenage.
Source: Survation x Best for Britain Voting Intention MRP March 2024
Fieldwork 8th – 22nd March 2024
I’m Kevin Bonavia, and I’m standing to be your Labour MP for Stevenage, Knebworth, Codicote, Datchworth & Aston. I’m proud to call Stevenage my home.
Our Town is aspirational, but we’ve been held back by 14 years of an out of touch Conservative government and a won’t get in touch Tory MP. I want to be the hardworking, full-time MP you truly deserve.
I’ve made a career getting justice for victims of hacking and fraud as a solicitor. I know what it takes to support people who are most in need of help.
I want to use this experience to represent you. Public service is in my DNA. I’ve spent 14 years as a councillor – serving as an armed forces champion.
As your MP, I’d be local, accessible and always on your side.
Only Labour’s Kevin Bonavia can beat the Conservatives in Stevenage. Every donation to my campaign will help our fight for change here in Stevenage.
I’m proud to call Stevenage my home. As your MP, I’ll always live locally, so I can continue to live, sleep and breathe day-to-day life in the town I love.
I’m making a ‘no second jobs guarantee’, so you know that all of my time will be spent being a full-time, hardworking MP for our town and villages.
I’ll always put the needs of the local community first, and promise to visit to every small and large business, shop and school in my first term.
I’ll use my time in parliament to give Stevenage and our villages a voice, and set up a ‘school trips to parliament scheme’ in my first year as your MP.
I’ll use my budget to open a local constituency office and hire a dedicated team of caseworkers that are accessible to Stevenage and our villages.
Promoted by Tom Plater on behalf of Kevin Bonavia both at 13a Town Square, SG11BP, Stevenage
